message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You were too generous, I'll take a bit more this time!
You're being greedy! I'll make a new offer.
You can have less, I'm willing to take more!
I'm not getting any younger, I need a bigger share!
You're getting old, but I'm not getting any poorer!
Last chance to make a deal, or I'll take it all!
I'm not afraid of a fight, I'll take what's mine!
You're getting bolder, but I'm not backing down!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
I'm not backing down, I'll take a bigger share this time!
You're being ruthless, I'll make a last stand!
This is my last, last offer. Take it, or I'll walk away with nothing!
